title: PulseFire Ezreal Disabled?
body: Why is the pulsefire ezreal skin currently disabled?

replies.body: Ok thank you guys, I was a little upset to find my skin disabled as I was unaware of the issue. But thanks again as long as his getting fixed along with the other skins.

Pulsfire Ezreal had a bug were when he used his ultimate, a bunch of random blue squares appeared around the ULT and it would be rather annoying ..
Happened in a Siv HD stream

>Network Operations â€“ 11:04 AM
Dragon Trainer Lulu, Winter Wonder Lulu, Arclight Vel'Koz, **Pulsefire Ezreal** and Triumphant Ryze are temporarily disabled while we work on fixing a bug with the skins.

Source: http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce

If you want more details I suggest checking NA/EU boards.
same with my arclight vel'koz skin..
They don't want rich people to buy the skin.
